All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    Argument
    Represents an argument
    ArgumentResult
    This class converts string values into the given types
    ArgumentResultConverter
    Converter interface
    CategoryLimitable
    Commands that implements this interface can be limited for categories
    CategoryLimitation
    Represents a specific type of limitation
    ChannelArgument
    An argument that has a regex that only accepts inputs what are channel tags
    ChannelLimitable
    Commands that implements this interface can be limited for channels
    ChannelLimitation
    Represents a specific type of limitation
    ComboArgument
    Represents an argument that has multiple choices, and they are the only valid values for the user to pick The values are key value pairs The key is String and the value can be String or Integer
    Command
    A class that represents a command
    CommandActionListener
    The action listener
    CommandBuilder
    Useful class that makes Command creations more comfortable
    CommandErrorListener
    The error listener
    CommandErrorType
    Enum with error type constants
    CommandHandler
    The main class of the API
    CommandResponder
    A class that takes methods out from SlashCommandInteraction that are to respond to a command CommandHandler returns it inside CommandActionListener
    ConstantArgument
    Only accepts inputs that are exactly the same as its name
    GlobalCommand Deprecated.
    use ServerCommand instead
    GlobalCommandBuilder Deprecated.
    use ServerCommandBuilder instead
    GroupArgument
    Represents an argument with SUB_COMMAND_GROUP type that only can contain ConstantArgument This is for grouping SUB_COMMAND options because SUB_COMMANDS cannot be nested
    InputArgument
    Represents argument that can have multiple value depends on the user input and the restrictions of the argument These arguments can be optional
    Limitation<T>
    Represents a command limitation
    MentionArgument
    An argument that has a regex that only accepts inputs what are mention tags
    MultiArgument Deprecated.
    don't use, because it is not working use ComboArgument instead it will be removed in the next version
    NumberArgument
    An argument that only accepts number inputs inside integer's range (from -2147483648 to 2147483647)
    PrivateCommand Deprecated.
    PrivateCommandBuilder Deprecated.
    since the new command system doesn't support private commands
    RegexArgument Deprecated.
    don't use it because it is not working use ValueArgument instead it will be removed in the next version
    RoleArgument
    An argument that only accepts role as input and returns a Role
    RoleLimitable
    Commands that implements this interface can be limited for roles
    RoleLimitation
    Represents a specific type of limitation Commands with this limitation do not work in private
    ServerCommand
    A Command that only can be used on servers where the command has been registered.
    Can be limited for users, roles, channels and categories.
    ServerCommandBuilder
    Useful class that makes ServerCommand creations more comfortable
    StringArgument
    An argument that only accepts any string value
    SubArgument<T extends Argument>
    Represents a sub argument Classes that extends this class can have arguments
    URLArgument
    An argument that only accepts URL inputs
    URLConverter
    Converts to URL from the given value that is expectedly is a valid URL.
    UserLimitable
    Commands that implements this interface can be limited for users
    UserLimitation
    Represents a specific type of limitation Commands with this limitation do not work in private
    ValueArgument
    Represents an argument that accepts a specified type of value
